title: Encyclopedia of business and finance.
subject: Business$$QBusiness -- Encyclopedias
Commerce$$QCommerce -- Encyclopedias
Finance$$QFinance -- Encyclopedias
Finance -- North America$$QFinance -- North America -- Encyclopedias
North America -- Commerce$$QNorth America -- Commerce -- Encyclopedias
format: 1 online resource (2 volumes (xi, 884 pages)) : color illustrations, charts
publisher: Farmington Hills, Michigan : Macmillan Reference USA
description: This encyclopedia covers five general areas: finance and banking; accounting; marketing; management; and information systems. Drawing on practical professional expertise as well as that of noted scholars, the contributors include executives, government administrators and scholars from leading business programs from around the United States.
contributor: Macmillan Reference USA (Firm), editor.$$QMacmillan Reference USA (Firm)

abstract: This encyclopedia covers five general areas: finance and banking; accounting; marketing; management; and information systems. Drawing on practical professional expertise as well as that of noted scholars, the contributors include executives, government administrators and scholars from leading business programs from around the United States.
